page.title: 15Children's Playground Games
page.content: Childrens play today has not changed much.Some of the old games are still played in the playground.Football, skipping and hopscotch are some of the popular games played.Things have changed in the way we play games.Now adays the boys play Crab football.They go around on their hands and feet to get the ball and they must not get up.(it is very hard.)When the boys play proper football they make a goal at each end of the playground.They don't usually split up into teams,Ian and Tony play the rest,as they are the best.Skipping is a very old game and played mostly by girls but some boys join in.Skipping has only changed by what we chant,here is a rhyme.Into the rope,And out of the rope,And into the rope again,Up to the sky,Ever so high,And down to the ground again.Many of the old rhymes are still used today.
